name: Job for a Cowboy
description:
'''Job for a Cowboy''' is an American [[death metal]] band from [[Glendale, Arizona]]. Formed in 2003, the band's debut album ''[[Genesis (Job for a Cowboy album)|Genesis]]'' was released in 2007, peaking at No. 54 on the US [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]] and selling 13,000 copies in its first week of release. The second album, 2009's ''[[Ruination (album)|Ruination]]'', sold 10,600 copies in the United States in its first week to debut at position No. 42 on the ''Billboard'' 200 chart. The band comprises vocalist Jonny Davy, guitarists Tony Sannicandro and Al Glassman and bassist Nick Schendzielos. Davy is the only remaining founding member.

The band has played in international music festivals, including Sounds of the Underground, [[Download Festival]], [[Mayhem Festival]], [[Summer Slaughter]], [[Graspop Metal Meeting]], and [[Wacken Open Air]].
